ygData.subject: Re: Medium sized cloth armor in Freeport?
ygData.msgSnippet: That is correct. The gnome shop by the bank in North Freeport sells medium cloth armor.
ygData.messageBody:
That is correct. The gnome shop by the bank in North Freeport sells medium
cloth armor.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Bret Guillet [SMTP:destine@...]
> Sent: Thursday, May 06, 1999 10:01 AM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Medium sized cloth armor in Freeport?
>
> From: Bret Guillet <destine@...>
>
> I believe I bought mine in North Freeport. Don't those gnomes sell Medium
> cloth at the Marketplace? Little blue building with a forge outside it
> for
> some odd reason.
>
> > As the title says, is there anywhere in FP to purchase medium sized
> cloth
> > armor? You would think being a human town there is, but so far all I
> can
> > find is 2 pieces for sale in North Ro.
>
>
> --
> Destine "Education makes a people easy to lead, but difficult
> Bret Guillet to drive; easy to govern but impossible to enslave."
> destine@... - Lord Brougham
> Programmer
>
